resources.string:
When the phone is connected to an Android Auto device the notifications can be viewed on the Android Auto display. The notifications can then be read to the user and the user is able to reply by voice.


This example launches a notification to the Android Auto display as if there has been send a text message. Android Auto is able to read the notification to the user and the user can reply by voice.


To be able to simulate an Android Auto device, please make sure you have the Android Auto API Simulators installed.
This is the Android Auto Notification
Tap to view documentation about notifications.
